医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
与儿童失调相关的母亲炎症危险因素美国国立卫生研究院环境对儿童健康结果影响 (ECHO) 项目资助的一项研究表明，母亲炎症风险因素可能与儿童的失调有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Maternal-inflammation-risk-factors-linked-to-dysregulation-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Maternal-inflammation-risk-factors-linked-to-dysregulation-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=102c6206-ce01-4f19-a696-0e60fa9e04f6 Thu, 07 Dec 2023 15:20:14 -0500 Maternal inflammation risk factors linked to dysregulation in children
新机制导致脊髓性肌萎缩症运动神经元变性芝加哥安和罗伯特 H. 卢里儿童医院斯坦利曼尼儿童研究所的 Yongchao C. Ma 博士的实验室发现了一种导致脊髓性肌萎缩症 (SMA) 中运动神经元变性的新机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Novel-mechanism-leads-to-motor-neuron-degenesis-in-spinal-muscular-atropy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Novel-mechanism-leads-to-motor-neuron-degenesis-in-spinal-muscular-atropy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8848f282-4438-48cf-b6c4-d0421158d675 Thu, 07 Dec 2023 15:13:38 -0500 Novel mechanism leads to motor neuron degeneration in spinal muscular atrophy
新的早期研究评估女性“按需”艾滋病毒预防方法美国国际开发署 (USAID) 的 MATRIX 正在进行一项新的早期研究，正在评估女性在性行为时或性行为前后使用的一种快速溶解的阴道塞剂，作为一种“按需”艾滋病毒预防方法。 ）资助的项目重点关注针对女性的创新艾滋病毒预防产品的早期研究和开发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/New-early-phase-study-evaluates-e2809con-demande2809d-HIV-prevention-method-for-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/New-early-phase-study-evaluates-e2809con-demande2809d-HIV-prevention-method-for-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6428d46e-f940-43cb-8852-cec2381f7e11 Thu, 07 Dec 2023 15:04:10 -0500 New early phase study evaluates “on-demand” HIV prevention method for women
突破性发现为检测和治疗白血病的新方法铺平了道路由 François Fuks 癌症表观遗传学实验室、ULB 医学院、ULB 癌症研究中心和 HUB Jules Bordet 研究所领导的研究人员在白血病的理解和治疗方面取得了重大突破。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Breakthrough-discovery-paves-the-way-for-new-methods-to-detect-and-treat-leukemia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Breakthrough-discovery-paves-the-way-for-new-methods-to-detect-and-treat-leukemia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=63601512-5b2a-427e-a642-be96c83358ca Thu, 07 Dec 2023 14:56:11 -0500 Breakthrough discovery paves the way for new methods to detect and treat leukemia
早期治疗为儿童艾滋病患者提供了免药物缓解的机会根据《柳叶刀 HIV》发表的一项多国研究，出生时就感染 HIV 并在出生后 48 小时内开始治疗的儿童在 2 岁时表现出生物标志物的比例出人意料地高，这可能使他们有资格测试无药物缓解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Early-treatment-offers-chance-at-medication-free-remission-for-pediatric-HIV-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Early-treatment-offers-chance-at-medication-free-remission-for-pediatric-HIV-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fbda129b-8e85-4440-a52f-21219e3573c6 Thu, 07 Dec 2023 14:49:55 -0500 Early treatment offers chance at medication-free remission for pediatric HIV patients
研究发现 BRCA1 基因表观突变与三​​阴性乳腺癌风险之间存在联系研究表明，大约 20% 的最严重乳腺癌病例可能是由携带特定基因表突变的一小群正常组织细胞引起的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Study-finds-link- Between-epimutations-in-BRCA1-gene-and-triple-阴性-breast-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Study-finds-link- Between-epimutations-in-BRCA1-gene-and-triple-阴性-breast-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f5dcb6e-3ccd-40d4-bc3f-6c7bb76c76a7 Thu, 07 Dec 2023 14:34:13 -0500 Study finds link between epimutations in BRCA1 gene and triple-negative breast cancer risk
IDEA 试验：对于患有早期乳腺癌的年轻绝经后患者来说，跳过放射治疗是安全的根据 IDEA 临床结果，几乎所有年龄在 50-69 岁、患有 I 期激素受体 (HR) 阳性乳腺癌且常见基因测试得分较低且选择不接受辅助放疗的绝经后患者在手术后 5 年内都没有患病。该试验在 2023 年 12 月 5 日至 9 日举行的圣安东尼奥乳腺癌研讨会上提出。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/IDEA-trial-Skipping-radiotherapy-safe-for-younger-postmenopausal-病人-with-early-stage-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/IDEA-trial-Skipping-radiotherapy-safe-for-younger-postmenopausal-病人-with-early-stage-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=998cade4-b373-41ad-b7b4-b3337aad9411 Thu, 07 Dec 2023 14:22:13 -0500 IDEA trial: Skipping radiotherapy safe for younger postmenopausal patients with early-stage breast cancer
研究表明运动可能成为转移性乳腺癌标准治疗的一部分根据 2019 年发表的 PREFERABLE-EFFECT 试验的结果，在转移性乳腺癌患者中，与未参加锻炼计划的患者相比，参加为期九个月的结构化锻炼计划的患者报告疲劳程度较低，生活质量提高。圣安东尼奥乳腺癌研讨会，2023 年 12 月 5 日至 9 日举行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Exercise-may-become-part-of-standard-treatment-for-metastatic-breast-cancer-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Exercise-may-become-part-of-standard-treatment-for-metastatic-breast-cancer-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=734ecdbb-8f33-4f7a-bd36-71227418d1d6 Thu, 07 Dec 2023 14:10:55 -0500 Exercise may become part of standard treatment for metastatic breast cancer, study suggests
欧盟资助国际“BEHIND-MS”联盟应对多发性硬化症多发性硬化症 (MS) 是一种中枢神经系统炎症性疾病，影响欧洲超过 100 万人，全球估计有 280 万人受到影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/EU-funds-the-international-BEHIND-MS-consortium-to-tackle-multiple-sclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/EU-funds-the-international-BEHIND-MS-consortium-to-tackle-multiple-sclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72a99e16-0fef-49d0-a62b-cbf194edd401 Thu, 07 Dec 2023 13:57:25 -0500 EU funds the international "BEHIND-MS" consortium to tackle multiple sclerosis
夜班工作与睡眠障碍的发生率较高相关睡眠对于白天和神经认知功能以及身心健康至关重要。当人们轮班工作时——2015 年，欧盟有 21% 的工人轮班工作——他们的昼夜节律睡眠-觉醒节律通常会被打乱。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Working-night-shifts-linked-with-higher-occurrence-of-disordered-sleep.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Working-night-shifts- Associated-with-higher-occurrence-of-disordered-sleep.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=068e324d-9903-4c3c-b444-5968f7dc70af Thu, 07 Dec 2023 13:42:28 -0500 Working night shifts associated with higher occurrence of disordered sleep
